_header: The first day of the year
_description: Calculating leap year by the computus — four couplets

BodAsh1404.Transcription:
The first of the yereFlet þe thrid hole to þe nereAnd
                    at the ferþe lepe yereWhile þou levest in ertheThrid eke
                    þe kennyththe Sonday what letter on rennythAnd in what
                    yerethe solsicle without wer
BodAsh1404.Editions:
Means,  Laurel. 
             “‘Ffor as moche as yche man may not haue þe astrolabe:’
                Popular Middle English Variations on the Computus.” 
             Speculum
         67 (1992): 595-623: 606.
